div.p: Use sourceReference to provide a direct link to a source element within sources in control from an element within the EAS instance that uses the source.
The attribute can be used to reference any detailed information about the described entity with a source.
The attribute is optionally available in elements which can contain text.

div.egXML: <relation sourceReference="source1" maintenanceEventReference="me2"> <targetEntity targetType="corporateBody" valueURI="https://snaccooperative.org/ark:/99166/w63z1x39" vocabularySourceURI="https://snaccooperative.org"> <part> Princeton University </part> </targetEntity> <relationType valueURI="https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q166118" vocabularySourceURI="https://www.wikidata.org/"> agency or institution responsible for the preservation and communication of records selected for permanent preservation </relationType> </relation>
